items.title: Anker’s extended SOLIX Black Friday Sale increases power station savings up to 70% with new lows starting from $150
items.summary:
Update 11/28: As expected, Anker SOLIX has extended its Black Friday Sale through Cyber Monday, with some increased pricing on select models, which has been updated below.

Anker SOLIX has launched the next phase of its ongoing Black Friday Sale with increased savings up to 70% across its power stations, bundles, and accessories, giving us the best prices we have seen all year – complete with free gifts with select purchases and at certain price thresholds. Among the expanded lineup, you can score the latest F3000 Portable Power Station starting solo at $1,199 shipped and coming with a FREE protective cover ($99 value), matching in price over at Amazon, though you won’t get the cover there. This new model has been on the market since June carrying a $2,599 full price tag, which we’ve seen go as low as $1,399 up until today. Now, with its Black Friday event in full gear, you’re getting an additional $200 discount to a new all-time low price, giving you a total $1,499 in savings this holiday season. Head below for the full rundown of deals while they’re around.

more…

Following right along the usual trends we see year after year in November, LEGO’s official Black Friday/Cyber Monday sale goes live today with member-only promotions, rewards, savings, and more – and just like last week’s Insiders Weekend, this event is promising to be another mad dash to claim a new, premium set that marks a new theme alongside the remaining retiring sets that have yet to sell out of stock (and will likely go after the sale ends). We’re seeing a collection of continued promotions from last week, as well as some new additions in the form of GWPs, Insider Points with purchases, redeemable rewards, sweepstakes to enter, and more. items.title: TCL’s NXTPAPER 14 Android tablet with 2.4K paper-like display hits $300 Black Friday all-time low with FREE stylus and folio case
items.summary:
As part of the ongoing Black Friday Week sale event, TCL’s official Amazon storefront is offering its NXTPAPER 14 Android tablet for $299.99 shipped. This 14-inch model hit the scene about a year ago with a $470 price tag, and today’s deal delivers a straight-up $170 discount on it. It dropped to $370 ahead of the fall Prime Day sale in September, but today’s Black Friday offer beats that by a wide margin to deliver the lowest price we have tracked for it to date. Also, the bundle discounted today includes the tablet, a T-Pen stylus, and a flip case, making it a solid package if you’re after a reliable Android tablet for everyday use. Head below for more details.
